sentences.en: A wedding is a joyful celebration of love.
sentences.cn: 婚礼就是快乐的爱情庆典。

sentences.en: A wedding is an emotionally charged situation.
sentences.cn: 婚礼是个让人动情的场合。

sentences.en: All mothers share to some extent in the tension of a wedding.
sentences.cn: 从某种程度上说，所有的母亲在婚礼上多少都有点紧张。

sentences.en: Before the wedding, I had a heart-to-heart talk with my mother.
sentences.cn: 婚礼前，我和母亲好好谈了谈心。

sentences.en: Go out of your way to mingle with others at the wedding.
sentences.cn: 去跟婚礼上的其他人聊聊。

sentences.en: He and Helen celebrated their silver wedding last year.
sentences.cn: 他和海伦去年庆祝了他们的银婚。

sentences.en: His first endeavours in the field were wedding films.
sentences.cn: 他初涉这个领域时做的是婚礼摄影。

sentences.en: I would like my wedding cake decorated with cupids.
sentences.cn: 我想在我的结婚蛋糕上装饰一些丘比特的造型。

sentences.en: My wedding dress has a very full skirt.
sentences.cn: 我结婚礼服的裙摆很宽松。

sentences.en: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
sentences.cn: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

sentences.en: She’s busy planning her daughter’s wedding.
sentences.cn: 她正忙着筹备女儿的婚礼。

sentences.en: The carpet was a wedding present from the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 这张地毯是首相送的结婚礼物。

sentences.en: The wedding season is upon us.
The wedding will be a very low-key affair.
The wedding will be at the Brompton Oratory next month.
sentences.cn: 婚礼将于下月在布朗普顿礼拜堂举行。

sentences.en: Truth to tell, John did not want Veronica at his wedding.
sentences.cn: 说实在的，约翰不想韦罗妮卡参加他的婚礼。

words.tran_cn: 结婚的；结合的；已结婚的

phrases.tran_cn: 金婚纪念（即结婚五十周年纪念）
n. 银婚（结婚二十五周年）
结婚纪念日；结婚周年纪念日
举行婚礼的日子；结婚纪念日

trans.tran_cn: （有宗教仪式的）婚礼，好事将近（指两人将要结婚）
trans.tran_en: a marriage ceremony, especially one with a religious service
